Uses of Interface
pizzaProgram.events.EventHandler

Packages that use EventHandler
pizzaProgram.core This package contains the entry point of the program, which initializes the main program window. 
pizzaProgram.database This package contains the core classes for communicating with the database. 
pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers This package contains classes that listens for read, write and system events. 
pizzaProgram.events All the classes comprising the core of the event system is stored in this package. 
pizzaProgram.gui This package contains classes for initialization of the various GUIs. 
pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers This package contains the event handler classes for the GUI. 
pizzaProgram.modules This package contains abstract classes that defines functionality for various modules of the program. 
 

Uses of EventHandler in pizzaProgram.core
 

Classes in pizzaProgram.core that implement EventHandler
 class Main
          The Main class acts as the root of the system.
 

Uses of EventHandler in pizzaProgram.database
 

Classes in pizzaProgram.database that implement EventHandler
 class DatabaseModule
          The main database module.
 

Uses of EventHandler in pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers
 

Classes in pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers that implement EventHandler
 class Database_ReadEventHandler
          The Database_ReadEventHandler handles all database events that require reading from the database
 class Database_WriteEventHandler
          The database write event handler handles all database events that require writing to the database
 

Uses of EventHandler in pizzaProgram.events
 

Fields in pizzaProgram.events with type parameters of type EventHandler
private  HashMap<String,ArrayList<EventHandler>> EventDispatcher.listeners
          A hash map containing lists of event listeners.
 

Methods in pizzaProgram.events with parameters of type EventHandler
 void EventDispatcher.addEventListener(EventHandler listenerModule, String eventType)
          Adds an event listener to the specified event type.
 

Uses of EventHandler in pizzaProgram.gui
 

Classes in pizzaProgram.gui that implement EventHandler
 class AdminGUI
          This class is for initializing the admingui, since adminview is autogenerated and should not be edited.
 class CookGUI
          This class is for initializing the cookgui, since cookview is autogenerated and should not be edited, all initialization and hiding/showing is handled by this class.
 class DeliverGUI
          This class is for initilizing the deliverygui, since deliveryview is autogenerated and should not be edited, all initalisation and hiding/showing is handled by this class
 class OrderGUI
          The OrderGUI module handles everything that has to do with the Orders view of the program.
 class ProgramWindow
          The ProgramWindow class creates the application's main window, with several features attached to it
 

Uses of EventHandler in pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers
 

Classes in pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers that implement EventHandler
 class AdminGUI_SystemEventHandler
          The AdminGUI System event handler handles all events coming from the system, and are directed at the admin GUI.
 class CookGUI_SystemEventHandler
          Handles all events from the system directed at the cook GUI
 class DeliveryGUI_SystemEventHandler
          Handles all events coming from the system and that are directed at the delivery GUI
 class OrderGUI_SystemEventHandler
          Handles all the events coming from the system directed at the Order GUI.
 

Uses of EventHandler in pizzaProgram.modules
 

Classes in pizzaProgram.modules that implement EventHandler
 class GUIModule
          The base class for a GUI module.
 class Module
          The Module is a basic part of the system.
 class TimeredDataUpdater
          Periodically dispatches a data refresh request event to the various GUI views, so that they can update their own data
